title: Vision
description: Madi sees demons, the very embodiment of the vices that stalk humanity. Gift or curse, it has never done anything good for her—only shown her how ugly the world truly is.Her visions might have helped the night of Cassi’s accident—maybe she could have seen something, stopped it. But she ran—like always.Now, with Cassi clinging to life, Madi struggles to keep herself and Vision Records from falling apart. The demons, however, have plans of their own.
author: Galen Snowden
